articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
The Ghirls kick off the 2024/25 campaign when Elena Sadiku’s title-winning side take on Dundee United at Celtic Park on Saturday, August 10. In yet another milestone for the history-making team, Celtic FC Women will unfurl the Champions’ flag for the first time in the SWPL, before kick-off at 1pm. Be there to show your […]
The post GHIRLS IN GREEN appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: GHIRLS IN GREEN

articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
Hibs cutting Celtic’s allocation for the first away game of the season is more unwelcome news for Celtic fans. The allocation has been cut by just under 700 tickets which make it even harder now to nail down a ticket and push more Celtic fans into trying to get tickets to sit with Hibs fans. […]
The post Away Days Ticket Cut appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: Away Days Ticket Cut

articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
The details for Celtic v Hibs in the League Cup last 16 tie  have been confirmed. Celtic  will take on Hibs at Celtic Park on Sunday, August 18. Kick-off will be at 3pm with the match televised on Premier Sports 1.
The post Celtic v Hibs League Cup Clash appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: Celtic v Hibs League Cup Clash

articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
